trans-unit.target: Choco Dash<tab>Temporarily boosts speed without depleting stamina. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Duration: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 1s

Choco Cure<tab>Restores 6% of total stamina.
Choco Cure II<tab>Restores 9% of total stamina.
Choco Cure III<tab>Restores 12% of total stamina.
Choco Esuna<tab>Removes all current enfeeblements with a 75% success rate.
Choco Esuna II<tab>Removes all current enfeeblements with a 90% success rate.
Choco Esuna III<tab>Removes all current enfeeblements with a 100% success rate.
Choco Ease<tab>Cures Heavy status while restoring stamina by 80.
Choco Ease II<tab>Cures Heavy status while restoring stamina by 130.
Choco Ease III<tab>Cures Heavy status while restoring stamina by 180.
Choco Calm<tab>Cures Frenzied status while restoring stamina by 100.
Choco Calm II<tab>Cures Frenzied status while restoring stamina by 150.
Choco Calm III<tab>Cures Frenzied status while restoring stamina by 200.
Choco Reflect<tab>Repels any non-area of effect enfeeblement back to its point of origin. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Duration: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 10s
Choco Reflect II<tab>Repels any non-area of effect enfeeblement back to its point of origin. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Duration: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 15s
Choco Reflect III<tab>Repels any non-area of effect enfeeblement back to its point of origin. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Duration: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 20s
Choco Steal<tab>Take an item from the satchel of the forerunning jockey with a 50% success rate.
Choco Steal II<tab>Take an item from the satchel of the forerunning jockey with a 70% success rate.
Choco Steal III<tab>Take an item from the satchel of the forerunning jockey with a 90% success rate.
Choco Silence<tab>Creates a vacuum of silence preventing any nearby chocobo from using abilities. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Duration: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 35s
Choco Silence II<tab>Creates a vacuum of silence preventing any nearby chocobo from using abilities. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Duration: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 40s
Choco Silence III<tab>Creates a vacuum of silence preventing any nearby chocobo from using abilities. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Duration: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 45s
Choco Shock<tab>Creates a disconcerting aura which distracts nearby chocobos and prevents them from using items. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Duration: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 25s

Choco Shock II<tab>Creates a disconcerting aura which distracts nearby chocobos and prevents them from using items. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Duration: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 30s

Choco Shock III<tab>Creates a disconcerting aura which distracts nearby chocobos and prevents them from using items. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Duration: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 35s
Increased Stamina<tab>Reduces stamina depletion during acceleration by 9%.
Increased Stamina II<tab>Reduces stamina depletion during acceleration by 12%.
Increased Stamina III<tab>Reduces stamina depletion during acceleration by 15%.
Heavy Resistance<tab>Increases chances of resisting Heavy to 60%.
Heavy Resistance II<tab>Increases chances of resisting Heavy to 70%.
Heavy Resistance III<tab>Increases chances of resisting Heavy to 80%.
Heavy Resistance IV<tab>Increases chances of resisting Heavy to 90%.
Heavy Resistance V<tab>Increases chances of resisting Heavy to 100%.
Level Head<tab>Increases chances of resisting Frenzied status to 60%.
Level Head II<tab>Increases chances of resisting Frenzied status to 70%.
Level Head III<tab>Increases chances of resisting Frenzied status to 80%.
Level Head IV<tab>Increases chances of resisting Frenzied status to 90%.
Level Head V<tab>Increases chances of resisting Frenzied status to 100%.
Speedy Recovery<tab>Increases ability-induced stamina recovery by 50%.
Speedy Recovery II<tab>Increases ability-induced stamina recovery by 65%.
Speedy Recovery III<tab>Increases ability-induced stamina recovery by 80%.
Dressage<tab>Increases EXP earned in races by 10%.
Dressage II<tab>Increases EXP earned in races by 20%.
Dressage III<tab>Increases EXP earned in races by 30%.
Head Start<tab>Begin the race at maximum speed.
Choco Drain<tab>Generates a field which drains the stamina of nearby chocobos at a rate of 15 per second.
Choco Drain II<tab>Generates a field which drains the stamina of nearby chocobos at a rate of 25 per second.
Choco Drain III<tab>Generates a field which drains the stamina of nearby chocobos at a rate of 35 per second.
Paradigm Shift<tab>Swaps current item with a different one.
Mimic<tab>Repeats any ability or item used by a forerunning chocobo. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Duration: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 7s
Mimic II<tab>Repeats any ability or item used by a forerunning chocobo. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Duration: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 11s
Mimic III<tab>Repeats any ability or item used by a forerunning chocobo. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Duration: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 15s
Feather Field<tab>Nullifies the detrimental field effects of any nearby chocobos. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Duration: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 10s
Feather Field II<tab>Nullifies the detrimental field effects of any nearby chocobos. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Duration: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 20s
Feather Field III<tab>Nullifies the detrimental field effects of any nearby chocobos. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Duration: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 30s
Super Sprint<tab>Sprint without weather or terrain penalties until all stamina is spent.
Choco Reraise<tab>Instantly restores 60 stamina when stamina meter reaches zero.
Choco Reraise II<tab>Instantly restores 130 stamina when stamina meter reaches zero.
Choco Reraise III<tab>Instantly restores 200 stamina when stamina meter reaches zero.
Enfeeblement Clause<tab>Reduces enfeeblement duration by 20%.
Enfeeblement Clause II<tab>Reduces enfeeblement duration by 35%.
Enfeeblement Clause III<tab>Reduces enfeeblement duration by 50%.
Breather<tab>Restores stamina at a rate of 0.8% per second while decelerating.
Breather II<tab>Restores stamina at a rate of 1% per second while decelerating.
Breather III<tab>Restores stamina at a rate of 1.2% per second while decelerating.
